review.title: Great location! Clean and nice staff.
review.reviewText: We had a room on the 19th floor and the view was spectacular! great comfort, no noise
review.negativeRemarks: Maybe more choices for the breakfast buffet.. Was delicious but only a few items..
review.locationRemarks: Caffes, restaurants, shopping all in walkable distance

managementResponses.response: Thank you for writing about your recent stay.  We are sorry that you were disappointed in the parking prices, concierge and hotel amenities.  We do pride ourselves in being inclusive for families and business travelers alike.  I am sorry that we did not demonstrate this to you and I will share your comments with our concierge team.  We will review our family friendly restaurant lists since there are many in San Francisco.  Again, we appreciate you sharing this feedback.  We are glad you had fun around the Pier and hope you give us another opportunity on your next visit.

review.title: Meant more for business travelers, not for family
review.reviewText: The hotel location was great.  My wife and kids loved all the things going on around the Pier and evenings were nice too, we checked out a few small restaurants nearby that were very accommodating for special requests.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location close to downtown and the Pier.
review.negativeRemarks: Valet parking was pricey, not much in the way of additional hotel amenities.  The concierge wasn't all that good at recommending family restaurants.
review.locationRemarks: Great restaurants nearby, best if you find them on your own.  Exploring the pier was lots of fun with the family.

review.title: Feel front desk staff need improvement
review.reviewText: I would rate Over all experience as A+ but need some improvement at the front desk
review.positiveRemarks: Location, rooms and A+ and extra courteous services of gate / lobby staff
review.negativeRemarks: Front desk service. Too slow location is excellent with walking distance to major attractions
review.locationRemarks: Lotion is excellent walking distance to major attractions and restaurants

review.title: The people make the hotel
review.reviewText: It's located well (sort of between everything) and the people are just wonderful.

review.title: My only choice in SF
review.reviewText: Excelente location, service, price, amenities. There really isn't anything to complaint about this hotel - maybe only the fact that I cannot live here :)

managementResponses.response: Thank you for staying with us and sharing your experiences.  We are sorry about the dirty towels and the response you received from us.  While the manager was truly sorry for you not having cleaning towels we could have also offered to send some up to your room. We will share this review with our entire team so that we can learn from this.  Thank you for letting us know about the buffet as well.  While it is competitively priced we want you to feel you received what you are paying for.  We will review our offerings with our culinary and service team.  Our parking prices are also competitive to the local market but we would be happy to help you find less expensive options on your next visit.  We do have in and out privileges with our parking which is a good value compared to the local lots.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to welcome you again soon.

review.title: Bad managment
review.reviewText: After my first night no ones shows to clean our room... we come back to the hotel at 11:30pm and fund the dirty towels on the floor...nothing was done.. I had to shower and re use the dirty towels that I had lifted in the bathroom floor. I went to take to the hotel manager and she just said I am sorry... ridiculous... 4 start hotel w no customer service. I will never stay in this property anymore.. the didn't offer me nothing.. I had breakfast there one time and the breakfast buffer is sooo poor and expensive... not worse it.. its better to got across the street and get a coffee etc.ANOTHER ABSURD IS THE 70 DOLARS VALET PARKING DAILY FEE
review.negativeRemarks: CHANGE MANAGEMENT TIME AND REVIEW PARKING CHARGES, BREAKFAST IS BED (NO OPTIONS).

review.reviewText: The d√©cor and ambience of the hotel and room were warm and welcoming, without pretense.  The staff was helpful, even loaning me a tie as I'd forgotten to pack one and no shops were open before my morning meeting.

review.title: great staff, great view, great time
review.reviewText: I was very happy with my stay at the Le Meridien. Thanks in a large part to Callie and Lara. They were instrumental in making my stay the enjoyable experience it was.
review.locationRemarks: Great location. Close to the bay and tourist stuff, as well as the city and convenient for exploring the area.

review.reviewText: Great hotel, friendly staff, good location, and comfortable accommodations.
We had great service, a beautiful upgraded room with amazing city views. We will def be back.

review.title: Great hotel in the financial district
review.reviewText: I really enjoyed my stay at Le Meridien. The room was not super luxurious - just very nice. It's a good space, with a nice view through floor-to-ceiling windows. Good design, nice materials, good attention to detail (like electrical and Usb outlets by the bed and at the desk where you want them.
Absolutely great, professional staff. Unique as always. Good job, Le Meridien

managementResponses.response: Thank you kindly for taking a moment to leave this great review. While we're happy to see how much you enjoyed our location, guest rooms, and amenities, providing value to our guests is one of our top priorities. While we work hard to ensure our pricing is competitive compared to the local market, our management team will take your comments into consideration moving forward. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again soon!

review.title: Good central location
review.reviewText: Great location with nice rooms and facilities, downside is they nickel and dime you for every little thing that would come standard at other hotels.
It was an excellent hotel to stay at.  The customer service was great

review.title: Great stay in the City
review.reviewText: Fabulous location. Walking distance to North Beach and the ferry building. Spacious modern room with a view. Our new "go to" SF hotel

review.title: Quite and clean
review.reviewText: This hotel is really nice. We stayed in an executive room it comes with a bay view.  We stayed on Saturday so it was quite because this hotel is located in the Financial  District. There was a fare amount of restaurants to choose from. We also went to a comedy show. Which is in rock throwing distance from the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Clean and the room sizes is awesome.
review.locationRemarks: Comedy club, parking garage is two blocks away, plenty of restaurants and bars to choose from

review.title: Elegant hotel
review.reviewText: It was an exceptional stay very pleasant and quiet property the associates were very friendly and very knowledgeable about the hotel. If you don't know where to go to in downtown just ask them and they will gladly assist you. I would definitely come back !
review.positiveRemarks: The rooms are nice and clean also if you are hungry during the night they have in room dining 24 hours available.
review.negativeRemarks: An electronic bill send to an email address would be awesome . I've stay at the W hotel and they send an email about all the charges made to the room.
review.locationRemarks: Location is nice and there are so many things to do they're several restaurants and bars there is a shopping area as well as tourist areas nearby.

review.title: Great Central Location in Financial District
review.reviewText: Had a great time! There were a couple days the hotel was being picketed by a local union early in the morning, but overall we really enjoyed our location. We stayed on the 8th floor- would recommend that location or higher if you're sensitive to traffic.
review.positiveRemarks: Great TV's, Large shower, and fast elevators.
review.negativeRemarks: Notification of picketing events and expected response.
review.locationRemarks: Peet's coffee and tea around the corner is a great place to take your hotel newspaper and grab breakfast.

review.title: Nice hotel in a decent area.
review.reviewText: We stayed in a regular king room, the room was spacious and the bedding was comfortable. We had a nice little corner view of the bay bridge! It seems like the amenities in the room have been upgraded recently. The thing that could have been better is the water pressure in the shower but overall it was a great stay. The location is pretty good. Let's be honest SF has a huge homeless problem and in the financial district there are considerably less than union square and the sort. The hotel was withing walking distance of the piers and markets near the bay bridge and made for a nice walk down. There are coffee shops all around this hotel. If you are looking to go out at night the Uber rides will cost you around 20 dollars to get to the popular local bars, so not bad. One thing to note about parking is there is a parking garage on battery street withing a 30 second walk of the hotel. I think it was $34 dollars for 24 hours but I got it for $25 (no in and out privilege however) using an app called spot hero. The valet at the hotel charges $65 and parks in the same structure (they do allow in and out). We got the hotel on a deal for around $250 and considering how expensive all of the hotels in SF are I would consider this hotel a good deal and would stay here again.

review.title: Nice location , trendy rooms , friendly staff
review.reviewText: This is our second stay at this hotel. We stayed in a superior king room on the 23rd floor . We were really happy with our over night stay. It's close enough to walk through the embarcadero center across the street . We had dinner at Tadich grill around the corner . Really nice area . Even though the weekends most things are shut down on weekends being in the financial district the hotel itself is worth the stay . We will be back again .
